import React from 'react' import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub'; import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn'; import EmailIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Email'; import "../styles/Home.css"; function Home() { return (

Hi, My Name is Pavan G V

I am a driven and versatile professional with a strong Computer Science and Engineering academic background. My journey in the field began with a Bachelor's degree from PES College of Engineering, Mandya, followed by pursuing an M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from M.S Ramaiah Institute of Technology. I have consistently demonstrated a proactive approach toward learning and growth during my tenure.

Currently serving as a Software Engineer Intern at Beckman Coulter India Pvt. Ltd, Radiometer Opco, I am actively contributing to developing Windows applications and analysis of logs data. My commitment to excellence has been further honed by my experience as a Database Administrator at Cisco through Tata Consultancy Services Pvt Ltd, where I administered databases and spearheaded disaster recovery initiatives.

An enthusiast for research and innovation, I have undertaken significant projects showcasing my problem-solving prowess and creative thinking. My M.Tech, final year project delves into analyzing Named data networks under Distributed Denial of Service – Interest Flooding Attack. This experience has allowed me to explore cutting-edge security issues and mitigation strategies. Furthermore, diverse projects have enriched my journey, from developing a virtual mouse for Human-Computer Interaction and crafting responsive websites to predictive modeling using machine learning.

My pursuits extend beyond academics as I participate in conferences, workshops, and volunteer activities. With a firm grasp of programming languages, databases, networking, and operating systems, I am prepared to tackle intricate challenges in the ever-evolving technology landscape. As a continuous learner, researcher, and proactive contributor, I am eager to align my expertise with an organization that values innovation and growth.

Skills

  1. Front-End

    ReactJS, Angular, Redux, HTML, CSS, React Native, Flutter, NPM, Ionic, BootStrap, MaterialUI, Yarn, TailwindCSS, StyledComponents

  2. Back-End

    NodeJS, Java Spring, .NET, ExpressJS, GraphQL, ApolloServer, MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, DigitalOcean, AWS S3, MS SQL

  3. Languages

    JavaScript, Java, Python, C#, C, C++, TypeScript, Go
); } export default Home;
